sections.title: What is this webpage?
sections.body: An interactive resume built with Vue.js. Select the skills that interest you and print it out to paper or PDF. That way you see only what you want to see.

sections.title: How to use this webpage?
sections.body: Use the arrows on the side or the main menu bar to navigate to each section. Click the skills (tags) to view the related experiences and print the resulting resume as desired.

sections.title: Why did you make this webpage?
sections.body:
• It's fun!
  • It helped me learn a Javascript framework (Vue.js).
  • My background is unique enough that I don't feel a traditional resume accurately represents my abilities.
  • Traditional resumes seem to be lacking in general. If you don't care about my Python projects (e.g.), then they shouldn't have to take up space.
  • This site could also help me easily build a custom resume with a focus on certain skills.

sections.title: Tell me more about your background.
sections.body: I started out in mechanical engineering, and went to graduate school for my Ph.D. working with turbulence in an injected jet. However, a computational fluid dynamics course helped me realize how much I enjoy programming. After using online classes to develop knowledge in programming and data science, I took a job with IBM after graduating. Since then, I have enjoyed working as a software engineer on several different projects at IBM. For any other details or questions, please send me a message on LinkedIn and I would love to tell you more (yes, shocking that someone enjoys talking about themselves)!

sections.title: How can I contact you?
sections.body: Please send me a message on LinkedIn. A link to my LinkedIn page is also in the Actions section of this site . Any feedback on this webpage (good and bad) is welcome!
